title: Just installed, can't build any Rust code.
body:
When I try to build any Rust Program, it fails. I use Solus OS. I tried using the official Rust package in repositories but cargo was not working, so I removed the Rust package and installed with Rust Website's official instructions. I tried this code: ```rust fn main() { println!("Hello, world!"); } ``` I expected to see this happen: The code ran fine and printed "Hello World!" Instead, this happened: The build failed with the output: collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.52.1 (9bc8c42bb 2021-05-09) binary: rustc commit-hash: 9bc8c42bb2f19e745a63f3445f1ac248fb015e53 commit-date: 2021-05-09 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.52.1 LLVM version: 12.0.0 ```
Backtrace

``` ensar@cezeri ~/Projeler/Rust/deneme/merhaba $ RUST_BACKTRACE=1 cargo build --verbose Compiling merhaba v0.1.0 (/home/ensar/Projeler/Rust/deneme/merhaba) Running `rustc --crate-name merhaba --edition=2018 src/main.rs --error-format=json --json=diagnostic-rendered-ansi --crate-type bin --emit=dep-info,link -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C metadata=59d0d24e058a56bc -C extra-filename=-59d0d24e058a56bc --out-dir /home/ensar/Projeler/Rust/deneme/merhaba/target/debug/deps -C incremental=/home/ensar/Projeler/Rust/deneme/merhaba/target/debug/incremental -L dependency=/home/ensar/Projeler/Rust/deneme/merhaba/target/debug/deps` error: linking with `cc` failed: exit code: 1 | = note: "cc" "-Wl,--as-needed" "-Wl,-z,noexecstack" "-m64" "-Wl,--eh-frame-hdr"
